name: Disaster is coming [DEFINITIVE EDITION]
description:
[This is the definitive edition of the Jam game! We repaired, by spending more time into it. It have new mechanics, counter, bug fixing and what not! ]

SHOW US YOUR HIGH SCORE ;)

 Disaster is Coming is a turn based escape game, where you need to manage your actions count to make everyone escape on time!  Moving, pushing, count as actions, so use them carefully! Will you move to the right spot ? will you push the right chair ? Are you able to complete the challenge ? 

You exit the room through the green, exit tile.

It worked on IPad too (and some smartphone), but it's mostly for browsers and windows.
